name: demo-cicd-app
description: DEMO CI-CD Test Application with Turbopack

scripts.dev:turbo: concurrently "pnpm --filter frontend run dev" "dotnet run --project apps/api"
scripts.dev:legacy: concurrently "pnpm --filter frontend run dev:legacy" "dotnet run --project apps/api"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend build && dotnet build apps/api
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter frontend clean && dotnet clean apps/api
